name: Kaziranga Treasures
description:
Many of you might be familiar with The Kaziranga National Park of Assam that is famous for its rare one-horned Rhinoceros. The cases of rhino poaching for their horns have been increasing rapidly over the past recent years. So, I made a game that’s basically against rhino poaching.

The story that is included in this game is as follows: Rangili is the name of a girl protector who wants to save the rhinos from the poachers. The game follows with her shooting the poachers while trying to save the rhinos. The game also includes fun facts about the park!
